.. raw:: html

    <style type="text/css">

        margin: 10px !important;

    .imhr{
        display: block !important;
        left: 0 !important;

    </style>

mdl-r33-analysis
----------------

.. raw:: html

	<div style="clear: both"></div>
	<div class="container-fluid">
		<div class="row">
			<a href="https://liberalarts.utexas.edu/imhr/">
				<div class="thumbnail">
					<img class="imhr" src="_static/imhr.png">
				</div>
			</a>
		</div>
	</div>
	<br>
	<div class="container-fluid">
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-md-6">

mdl-r33-analysis provides a methods for analysis, data cleaning, and visualization of R33. 
This package was created at the `Institute for Mental Health Research <http://mdl.psy.utexas.edu/>`_, 
at `the University of Texas at Austin <http://www.utexas.edu/>`_ by `Semeon Risom <https://semeon.io>`_.

For a brief introduction to the ideas behind the library, you can read the
:ref:`introduction <introduction>`. Visit the :ref:`installation page
<install>` to see how you can download the package. You can browse the
:ref:`example <example>` to see what you can do with this package,
and then check out the :ref:`tutorial <api>` and :ref:`API reference
<index>` to find out how.

To see the code or report a bug, please visit the `github <https://github.com/risoms/mdl-r33-analysis>`_ repository.

   :hidden:
   :maxdepth: 1
   :glob:

   demographics <guide/demographics.ipynb>
   create_plots <guide/create_plots.ipynb>
   build_model <guide/build_model.ipynb>
   redcap
   settings
   api
